amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the bill's appropriation for special education by $1.4 billion and to offset this increase by reducing the bill's appropriations for other education programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 192 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the bill's appropriation for special education by $1.4 billion and to offset this increase by reducing the bill's appropriations for other education programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vitter amendment (A013) Failed by voice vote.
